TEXT.TITLE: AMERIHEALTH INC <AHTH> 4TH QTR LOSS
TEXT.BODY: Oper shr loss one ct vs loss 11 cts Oper net profit 89,000 vs loss 323,000 Revs 9,603,000 vs 6,116,000 Year Oper shr loss six cts vs loss 21 cts Oper net profit 158,000 vs loss 629,000 Revs 34.6 mln vs 22.8 mln NOTE: 1986 net excludes tax credits of 170,000 dlrs in quarter and 321,000 dlrs in year and gains on termination of pension plan of 82,000 dlrs in quarter and 190,000 dlrs in year. Share after preferred dividends. Reuter
